pages.text: Summoned from the far reaches of the Nether, these Hoglins have been infused the magics of the Nether, some saying blessed by the Nether itself.
The name 'Hoglord' is no misnomer. The beast truly rules over Hoglins to a great extant that even the wrathful Zoglins won't attack and even defend this creature.

The Hoglord's tusks are made similar to Blaze rods, only denser and harder. Due to this, their attacks sets their targets on fire. Occasionally, the beast spews out a gout of flame akin to Red Dragons of old, attacking it's target from afar. After a while, the Hoglord will start to do... something. Let's just say you want to stay away from it, else you get some of its... muck on you.
